sense.def:
To communicate with someone
pomeni nekomu dati podatke, na primer s pripovedovanjem, pisanjem ali prek radijskih signalov.

seg.quote: He communicates with Miami by radio.
Anthony and I hadn't communicated for years.
Through signs she communicated that she wanted a drink.

sense.def:
To communicate an idea or a feeling to someone
pomeni nekoga obvestiti o neki ideji ali čustvu.

seg.quote: ...the failure of intellectuals to communicate their ideas to a wider audience.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
communicate
, razumejo čustva in vedenje drug drugega.

seg.quote: Cliff talked to me a few times but we couldn't really communicate.
...his tough background and ability to communicate.
